Translations.Text: Mahamahimanbita tini yamra hate rayeche sarbabhauma kartrtba, ara tini saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana
yini mrtyu o jibana srsti karechena tomadera yaca'i karate ye tomadera madhye ke kajakarme srestha. Ara tini mahasaktisali, paritranakari
yini sata akasa srsti karechena subin'yastabhabe. Tumi parama karunamayera srstite kono asamanjasya dekhate pabe na. Tarapara tumi drsti ghuriye-phiriye na'o, tumi ki kono phatala dekhate paccha
tarapara drsti arekabara ghuriye-phiriye na'o, drsti tomara kache phire asabe byartha haye, ara ta habe klanta.

Ara amara nikatabarti akasake susobhita kare rekhechi pradipamala diye, ara amara tadera baniyechi sayatanadera jan'ya bhamotara bisaya; ara amara tadera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi jbalanta agunera sasti.
Ara yara tadera prabhuke abisbasa kare tadera jan'ya rayeche jahannamera sasti. Ara manda se'i gantabyasthana
yakhana tadera sekhane niksepa kara habe takhana tara tara theke bikata garjana sunate pabe, ara ta lelihana sikha charabe
yena krodhe phete parache. Yakhana'i kono ekadalake ote niksepa kara habe tara raksira tadera jijnasa karabe -- ''tomadera kache ki kono satarkakari asena ni?”

Tara balabe -- ''ham, amadera kache satarkakari itipurbe ese gechena, amara kintu asbikara karechilama o balechilama -- 'allah kono-kichu abatarana karena ni, tomara rayecha birata pathabhrantite bai to na'o’.’’
Ara tara balabe -- ''amara yadi sunatama athaba bud'dhi prayoga karatama tahale amara jbalanta agunera basindadera madhye hatama na.’’
Sutaram tara tadera aparadha sbikara karabe, phale jbalanta agunera basindadera jan'ya -- 'dura ha!’
Nihsandeha yara tadera prabhuke bhaya kare gopane tadera jan'ya rayeche paritrana o birata pratidana.
Athaca tomadera kathabarta tomara gopana kara athaba ta prakasa'i kara. Nihsandeha tini bukera bhetarera bisaya sanbandhe'o sarbajnata.
Yini srsti karechena tini ki janena na? Ara tini gupta bisaye jnata, purna-oyakiphahala.
Tini'i se'ijana yini prthibitake tomadera jan'ya kare diyechena santa, phale tomara era digadigante bicarana karacha ebam tara jibika theke ahara karacha. Ara tamra'i kache punarut'thana.
Ki! Yini urdhbaloke rayechena tamra kacha theke ki tomara nirapatta grahana karecha ye tini prthibike diye tomadera grasa karabena na, yakhana alabat ta andolita habe

Athaba yini urdhbaloke rayechena tamra kacha theke ki tomara nirapatta grahana karecha pache tini tomadera upare pathiye dena eka kankaramaya ghurnijhara? Phale tomara sighra'i janate parabe kemana chila amara satarkabani
ara edera age yara chila tara'o pratyakhyana karechila, takhana kemana hayechila amara asantosa
tara ki dekhe ni tadera upare pakhidera charano o gutano? Tadera parama karunamaya chara ke'u dhare rakhena na. Nihsandeha tini'i sarbabisaye samyaka drasta.
Accha, parama karunamayake bada diye ke se'iti -- ye habe tomadera jan'ya senabahini ye tomadera sahayya karabe? Abisbasira to bibhrantite thaka chara ara kotha'o naya.
Athaba ke se ye tomadera jibika debe yadi tini tamra riyeka bandha kare dena? Bastuta tara abadhyataya o bitrsnaya anara rayeche.
Accha, ye tara mukhera upare thubare thubare cale se ki tabe besi satpathe calita, na se'ijana ye soja haye cale sud'dha-sathika pathe
balo -- ''tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera bikasita karechena, ara tomadera jan'ya baniye diyechena srabanasakti o drstisakti o antahkarana. Tomara ya krtajnata prakasa kara se to yatsaman'ya!’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''tini'i se'ijana yini prthibite tomadera chariye diyechena, ara tamra'i kache tomadera ekatrita kara habe.’’
Ara tara bale -- ''kakhana e'i oyada habe? Yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Tumi balo -- ''jnana kebala allah‌ra'i kache ache, ara ami nihsandeha ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.’’
Tarapara tara yakhana eti asanna dekhate pabe takhana yara abisbasa karechila tadera cehara habe malina, ara bala habe -- ''eti'i ta'i ya tomara deke anachile.’’

Tumi balo -- ''tomara ki bhebe dekhecha, -- yadi allah amake o yara amara sange rayeche tadera dhbansa karena athaba amadera prati karuna karena, kintu ke abisbasidera raksa karabe marmantuda sasti theke?’’
Balo -- ''tini parama karunamaya, amara tamte imana enechi ebam tamra'i upare amara astha rekhechi, sutaram acire'i tomara janate parabe ke se'ijana ye spasta bibhrantite rayeche.’’
Bale ya'o -- ''tomara ki bhebe dekhecha -- yadi tomadera pani sata-sakale bhugarbhe cale yaya, tahale ke tomadera jan'ya niye asabe prabahamana pani?’’
Nuna! Bhabo kalama o ya tara lekhe.
Tomara prabhura anugrahe tumi kintu pagala na'o.
Ara tomara jan'ya niscaya'i rayeche emana eka pratidana ya sesa habara naya.
Ara nihsandeha tumi sumahana caritre adhisthita.
Phale tumi sighra'i dekhabe ebam tara'o dekhate pabe
ye tomadera madhye ke bikaragrasta.
Nihsandeha tomara prabhu, tini bhala janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche, ara tini bhala janena satpathapraptadera.
Ata'eba mithyacaridera ajnapalana karo na.
Tara caya ye tumi yadi namaniya ha'o tahale tara'o namaniya habe.
Ara ajnapalana karo na pratyekati halaphakarira, lanchitajanera
paranindakarira, kalanka ratate ghure-berano lokera
bhalokaje nisedhakarira, simalanghanakarira papacarira
sanda-gundara, tadupari asaccaritrera
e'ijan'ya ye se dhanasampadera ebam santanasantatira adhikari.
Yakhana tara kache amadera banisamuha patha kara haya se bale -- ''sekele kalpakahini!’’
Amara sighra'i tara umcu nake daga kare deba.
Amara niscaya'i tadera pariksa karaba yemana amara pariksa karechilama bagana-malikadera, yakhana ora kasama kheyechila ye tara niscaya bhorabela era phasala katabe
ara tara kono sanraksana kare ni.
Phale tomara prabhura kacha theke eka durbipaka era upare apatita hayechila yakhana tara ghumiye parechila.
Kaje'i sakalabelaya ta haye gela eka kalo nisphala jamira mato.
Tara kintu sata-sakale eke aparake dakadaki karale
e'i bale -- ''sakala sakala tomadera kheta-khamare ya'o yadi tomara phasala katate ca'o.’’
Takhana tara beriye parala, ara tara phisaphisa karate thakala
e'i bale -- ''aja yena tomadera birud'dhe kono habhate sekhane dhuke na pare.’’
Ara tara sakala sakala sankalpe drrhapratijna haye yatra karala.
Kintu yakhana tara ta dekhala tara balale -- ''niscaya amara patha bhula karechi.’’
Na, amara bancita hayechi.’’
Odera madhyera sresthajana balale -- ''ami ki tomadera bali ni, kena tomara japatapa karacha na?’’
Tara balale -- ''amadera prabhura mahima ghosita hoka, amara niscaya kichuta phasala dana karate an'yaya karechi.’’
Tarapara tadera ke'u-ke'u an'yera kache gela nijedera dosaropa karate karate.
Tara balale -- ''haya, dhik amadera! Amara niscaya'i sima chariye giyechilama.
Hate pare amadera prabhu amadera jan'ya era ceye'o bhala kichu badale debena, niscaya amadera prabhura kache'i amara sanunaya prarthana karachi.’’
Emanata'i sasti haye thake. Ara parakalera sasti to aro birata, -- yadi tara janato
nihsandeha dharmabhirudera jan'ya tadera prabhura kache rayeche anandamaya udyana-samuha.
Ki, amara ki tabe musalimadera banaba aparadhidera mato
ki hayeche tomadera? Kibhabe tomara bicara kara
na ki tomadera jan'ya kono grantha rayeche ya tomara adhyayana kara
ye, niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya tate ta'i rayeche ya tomara pachanda kara
athaba, tomadera jan'ya amadera upare kiyamatera dina paryanta balabat thaka emana kono angikara rayeche ki ye tomadera jan'ya alabat ta'i thakabe ya tomara sthira karabe
Tadera jijnasa karo -- tadera madhye ke e-sanbandhe jamina habe
na tadera jan'ya ansi-debatara ache? Temana hale tadera ansi-debatadera tara niye asuka yadi tara satyabadi haya.
Ekadina carama sankata dekha debe, ara tadera daka habe sijada karate, kintu tara saksama habe na.
Tadera drsti habe abanata, lanchana tadera jariye phelabe. Athaca tadera ahbana kara haye'i thakata sijada karate yakhana tara chila nirapada.
Ata'eba amake ebam ye e'i bani pratyakhyana kare take chere da'o. Amara tadera dhape dhape niye yaba, kemana kare ta tara bujhate'o parabe na.
Tathapi ami odera sahya kari. Amara phamda niscaya'i bara majabuta.
Athaba tumi ki tadera theke kono parisramika ca'icha yara phale tara dharakarja kare bharakranta haye geche
athaba adrsya ki tadera kache rayeche, yara phale tara likhe rakhe
ata'eba tomara prabhura hukumera jan'ya adhyabasaya caliye ya'o, ebam tumi machera sangira mato hayo na. Dekho! Tini bisade katara haye dekechilena.
Yadi tamra prabhura kacha theke anugraha tamra kache na paumchuta tahale tini abasya'i unmukta prantare niksipta hatena, ara tini hatena nindita.
Kintu tamra prabhu tamke manonita karechilena, phale tamke satpathabalanbidera antarbhukta karechilena.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kareche tara yakhana smaraka-grantha sone takhana tara yena tadera cokha diye tomake achare marabe, ara tara bale -- ''se to niscaya'i eka pagala.’’
Ara eti jagadbasira jan'ya smaraka-grantha bai to naya.
Niscita-satya
ki se'i niscita-satya
aha, ki diye tomake bojhano yabe niscita-satyata ki
chamuda o'adagosthi aghatakari pralayake asbikara karechila.
Tarapara chamudagosthira ksetre -- tadera takhana dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyaye.
Ara'adagosthira ksetre -- tadera takhana dhbansa kara hayechila eka garjanakari pracanda jharera dbara
yake tini tadera upare prabahita karechilena sata rata o ata dinabyapi, abiratabhabe, phale tumi se'i lokadalake dekhate pete sekhane lutiye pare ache, yena tara khejura gachera phampa guri.
Tarapara tumi tadera abasista kichu dekhate pa'o ki
ara phira'a'una ara yara tara purbabarti chila, ara bidhabasta saharagulo papacara niye esechila
yehetu tadera prabhura rasulake tara aman'ya karechila, sejan'ya tini tadera pakara'o karechilena eka sukathina pakaranote.
Nihsandeha yakhana pani phempe uthechila, takhana amara tomadera bahana kareliama jahajera madhye
yena amara etike tomadera jan'ya banate pari smaraniya bisaya, ebam srutidhara kana yena eti mane rakhate pare.
Sutaram yakhana sinaya phutkara de'oya habe -- ekati matra phutkara
ebam prthibi o pahara-parbata uttolana kara habe, ara ekatimatra dhakkaya tadera curnabicurna kara habe.
Ata'eba se'idina mahaghatana sanghatita habe
ara akasa bidirna habe, phale se'idina ta habe bhangura
ara phiris‌tara era prantaguloya ra'ibe. Ara tadera upare se'idina tomara prabhura arasa bahana karabe atajana.
Se'idina tomadera anabrta kara habe, -- kono gopana bisaya tomadera theke gopana thakabe na.
Tarapara yake tara ba'i tara dana hate deya habe se takhana balabe -- ''na'o, amara e'i ba'i pare dekho
ami niscaya'i janatama ye ami alabat amara e'i hisabera sam'mukhina hate yacchi.’’
Sutaram se thakabe eka purna-santosajanaka jibanayapane
eka umcu paryayera jannate
yara phalera thokagulo nagalera madhye.
Kha'o ara pana karo trptira sange se'ijan'ya ya tomara agekara dinaguloya sampadana karechile.’’
Ara tara ksetre yake tara ba'i tara bama hate de'oya habe se takhana balabe -- ''haya amara aphasosa! Amara e'i ba'i yadi amaya kakhano dekhano na hato
ara ami yadi kakhano janatama na amara e'i hisabati ki.
Haya aphasosa! E'ita'i yadi amara sesa hato
amara dhanasampada amara kono kaje ela na
amara kartrtba amara theke binasa haye geche.’’
Take dharo ebam take bamdho
tarapara jbalanta agune take niksepa karo
tarapara take eka sikale abad'dha karo yara daighya hacche sattara hata.
Niscaya se bisbasa karata na mahana allah‌te
ara se utsaha dekhata na garibadera khabara dite
sejan'ya aja tara jan'ye ekhane kono antaranga bandhu thakabe na
ara kono khadya thakabe na ksatanihsrta pujam byatita
ya papira byatita ara ke'u khaya na.’’
Kinta na, ami kasama khacchi ya tomara dekhacha tara
ebam ya tomara dekhacha na tara'o
ye eti eka sam'manita rasulera bani
ara e kono kabira alapana naya; saman'ya'i to ya tomara bisbasa kara.
Ara kono ganatkarera bak‌caturi'o naya, yatsaman'ya ya tomara cinta kara
e hacche eka abatarana bisbajagatera prabhura kacha theke.
Ara tini yadi amadera name kono bani racana karate ca'itena
tahale amara niscaya'i take danahate pakara'o karatama
tarapara niscaya'i tara kanthasira kete phelatama
takhana tomadera madhyera ke'u'i ora theke nibrtta karate parate na.
Ara niscaya'i e'iti dharmabhirudera jan'ya eka smaraka-grantha.
Ara niscaya'i amara to jani ye tomadera madhye satyapratyakhyanakari rayeche.
Ara nihsandeha eti abisbasidera jan'ya bara anutapera bisaya.
Ara nihsandeha eti to suniscita satya.
Ata'eba tomara mahamahimannita prabhura namera japatapa karo.
Eka prasnakari prasna karache abadharita sasti samparke
abisbasidera jan'ya, era pratirodhakari ke'u ne'i
Allah‌ra nikata theke, yini unnayanera sopanera adhikarta.
Phiris‌tagana o a‌tma tamra dike arohana kare emana eka dine yara parimapa halo pancasa hajara bachara.
Ata'eba tumi adhyabasaya caliye ya'o eka sumahana dhairyadharane.
Nihsandeha tara eke mane kare bahu dure
kintu amara dekhachi e nikate.
Se'idina akasa haye yabe galano tamara mato
ara paharagulo habe ulera mato
ara kono antaranga bandhu jijnasabada karabe na antaranga bandhu sanbandhe
tadera parasparake drstigocare rakha habe. Aparadhi byakti sasti theke se'idina muktilabha karate ca'ibe tara santanadera binimaye
ara tara sahadharminira o tara bha'iyera
ara tara nikata-a‌tmiyera yara take asraya dita
ara ya-kichu ache prthibite se-samastata'i, -- yena take mukti de'oya haya.
Kakhano'i naya! Nihsandeha eti eka sikhayita aguna
camara jhalasiye khasate udagriba
e dakabe take ye paliyechila o phire giyechila
ara jama karechila ebam atake rekhechila.
Nihsandeha manusera bela -- take srsti kara hayeche byastasamasta kare
yakhana kharapa abastha take sparsa kare takhana atiba byathatura
ara yakhana sacchalata take sparsa kare takhana hara-kipate
tara byatita yara muchalli
yara tadera namayera prati sbatahnisthabana
ara yara tadera dhanasampattite nirdista adhikara rekheche
bhikharira o bancitera jan'ya
ara yara bicarera dinake satya bale grahana kare
ara yara tadera prabhura sasti samparke khoda bhitasantrasta
niscaya tadera prabhura sasti prasantidayaka naya
ara yara nijera'i tadera angika-kartabyabali samparke yatnabana
tabe nijedera dampati athaba tadera danahata yadera dhare rekheche tadera chara, kenana seksetre tara nindaniya nahe
kintu ye era ba'ire ya'oya kamana kare tahale tara nijera'i habe simalanghanakari.
Ara yara khoda tadera amanata sanbandhe o tadera angikara sanbandhe sajaga thake
ara yara sbayam tadera saksyadane supratisthita
ara yara nijera tadera namaya sanbandhe sada yatnabana
tara'i thakabe jannate parama sam'manita abasthaya.
Kintu ki hayeche tadera yara abisbasa posana kare, ye tara tomara dike udagriba haye chute asache
dana dika theke o bama dika theke, daledale
tadera madhyera pratyeka loka'i ki asa kare ye take prabesa karano habe anandamaya udyane
kakhana'i na. Nihsandeha amara ki diye tadera garechi ta tara jane.
Kintu na, ami udayacalera o astacalera prabhura name sapatha karachi ye amara alabat samartha
ye amara tadera ceye bhalodera diye badale deba, ara amara parajita habara na'i.
Sejan'ya tadera chere da'o galpagujaba o kheladhulo karate ye paryanta na tara tadera se'i dinatira saksat paya yara sanbandhe tadera oyada kara hayechila
se'idina tara kabaragulo theke beriye asabe byastasamasta haye, yena tara ekati laksyasthalera dike dhabita hayeche
tadera cokha habe abanata, hinata tadera acchanna karabe. Emanata'i se'idina yara bisaye tadera oyada kara hayechila.
Nihsandeha amara nuh‌ke tamra lokadalera kache pathiyechilama e'i bale -- ''tomara lokadalake satarka kare da'o tadera upare marmantuda sasti asabara age.’’
Tini balechilena -- ''he amara sbajati! Nihsandeha ami tomadera jan'ya ekajana spasta satarkakari
e bisaye ye tomara allah‌ra upasana karo o tamke bhaya-bhakti karo, ara amake mene calo.

Tini tomadera papagulora katakata ksama karabena ebam tomadera birama debena eka nirdharita kala paryanta. Nihsandeha allah‌ra nirdharana kara kala yakhana ese pare takhana ta pichiye de'oya yaya na, -- yadi tomara janate!’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Ami to amara sbajatike rate o dine ahbana karechi
kinta amara daka tadera paliye ya'oya chara ara kichu'i baraya ni.

Ara niscaya yakhana'i ami tadera ahbana karechi yena tumi tadera ksama karate para, tara tadera kanera bhetare tadera angulagulo bhare deya, ara tadera kapara diye nijedera dheke phele, ara gom dhare, ara sagarbe garba kare.
Tarapara ami niscaya tadera ahbana karechi umcu galaya
tarapara niscaya ami tadera kache ghosana karechi, ara ami tadera sange gopane gopana katha balechi
ara ami balechi -- tomadera prabhura kache paritrana khomjo, niscaya tini hacchena parama ksamasila.
Tini tomadera upare brsti pathabena pracura parimane
ara tomadera samrd'dha karabena dhanadaulata o santanasantati diye, ara tomadera jan'ya tairi karabena baganasamuha, ara tomadera jan'ya sthapana karabena nadi-nala.
Tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara allah‌ra paksa theke sresthatba sbikara karate ca'icha na
athaca tini tomadera srsti kare'ichena stare-stare.
Tomara ki laksya kara ni kibhabe allah sata asamanake srsti karechena subin'yastabhabe
ara tadera madhye tini candrake karechena ekati aloka ara suryake baniyechena ekati pradipa.
Ara allah prthibi theke tomadera janmiyechena eka utpadanarupe.
Tarapara tini tomadera tate'i phire pathana, ebam tini tomadera bera kare anabena eka bahiskare.
Ara allah tomadera jan'ya prthibitake karechena subistrta
yena tomara tate calate para prasasta pathe.’’
Nuh balechilena -- ''amara prabhu! Nihsandeha tara amake aman'ya kareche ebam anusarana karache tara yara dhanasampatti o santanasantati ksatisadhana chara tara ara kichu'i baraya ni
ara tara eka birata sarayantra etechilam.’’
Ara tara balechila -- ''tomadera debadebike kichute'i parityaga karo na, ara parityaga karo na oyadake, ebam su'oyake na, ara naya yagusa o iya'uka o nasara-ke.’’
Ara tara anekake pathabhrasta kare'i pheleche. Ara tumi an'yayacaridera bibhranti chara ara kichu'i baraccha na
tadera aparadhera jan'ya tadera dubiye de'oya hayechila, phale tadera dhokano hayechila agune. Sutaram tara allah‌ke bada diye tadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari paya ni.
Ara nuh balechilena -- ''amara prabhu! E'i prthibira buke abisbasidera madhyera eka grhabasike'o abyahati diyo na.
Kenana tumi yadi tadera abyahati da'o tahale tara tomara bandadera bibhranta karabe, ara tara duskrtikari be'imanadera byatita ara karora janma debe na.

Amara prabhu! Amake paritrana karo, ara amara pitamatake, ara ye ke'u amara ghare bisbasi haye prabesa kare take, ara bisbasipurusadera o bisbasinidera. Ara an'yayacaridera ara kichu bariyo na nipata ha'oya byatita.’’
Balo -- ''amara kache pratyadesa kara hayeche ye jinadera ekati dala sunechila, ebam balechila -- 'amara niscaya eka ascaryajanaka kura'ana sunechi
ya susthupathera dike calana kare, ta'i amara tate imana enechi, ara amara kakhano amadera prabhura sathe ka'uke'o sarika karaba na
ara tini, -- su'unnata hoka amadera prabhura mahima, -- tini kono sahacari grahana karena ni, ara na kono santana
ara e'i ye amadera madhyera nirbodhera allah sanbandhe amulaka katha balata
ara e'i ye amara bhebechilama ye manusa o jina allah sanbandhe kakhano mithyakatha balabe na’
ara e'i ye manusera madhyera kichu loka jinajatira kichu lokera asraya nita, phale ora tadera papacara bariye dita
ara e'i ye tara bhebechila yemana tomara bhabacho ye allah ka'uke'o punarut'thita karabena na
Ara'amara akase ari patatama, kinta amara take dekhate petama kara prahari o agnisikha diye bharapura
ara amara niscaya tara madhyera basabara jayagaguloya base thakatama gunabara jan'ya, kinta ye ke'u sunate caya se ekhana dekhate paya tara jan'ya rayeche agnisikha apeksarata
ara amara abasya jani na -- prthibite yara rayeche tadera jan'ya amangala kamana kara hacche, na e-sabera dbara tadera prabhu susthupathera disa ca'ichena
ara niscaya amadera ke'u-ke'u satpathabalanbi ara amadera an'yera era biparita. Amara bibhinna sampradaya bibhinna panthi
ara amara bujhi ye amara duniyate kakhano allah‌ke parabhuta karate paraba na ebam palayanera dbara'o tamke kakhana'o erate paraba na
ara amara yakhana pathanirdesa sunechi amara tate bisbasa karechi. Sutaram ye ke'u tara prabhura prati bisbasa sthapana kare, se tabe asanka karabe na kame ya'oyara athaba lanchana pabara
ara amadera madhyera ke'u-ke'u abasya musalima ara amadera an'yera simalanghanakari. Sutaram yara a‌tmasamarpana kareche tara'i tabe susthupathera sandhana khomjeche.
Ara simalanghanakaridera ksetre -- tara to jahannamera'i indhana hayeche.’”
Ara e'i ye yadi tara nirdesita pathe kayema thakata tabe amara abasya'i tadera pracura pani diye samrd'dha karatama
yena amara tadera pariksa karate pari tara dbara. Ara ye ke'u tara prabhura smarana theke phire thake, tini take dhukiye debena cirabardhamana sastite.
Ara e'i ye masajidagulo hacche allah‌ra jan'ya, sutaram tomara allah‌ra sange ara ka'uke'o deko na.
Ara e'i ye yakhana allah‌ra banda tamke ahbana karate damriyechilena takhana tara ceyechila tamra caridike bhira karate.
Balo -- ''nihsandeha ami amara prabhuke'i daki, ara ami tamra sange ka'uke'o sarika kari na.’’
Tumi balo -- ''ami kono kartrtba kari na tomadera upare aghata hanara athaba upakara karara.’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''niscaya'i ke'u amake kakhano raksa karate parabe na allah theke, ara tamke bada diye ami kakhano kono asraya'o paba na
sudhu allah theke paumche de'oya, ara tamra banisamuha.’’ Ara ye allah o tamra rasulera abadhyata kare, tara jan'ya tabe niscaya'i rayeche jahannamera aguna, tate tara thakabe dirghakala.
Ye paryanta na tara dekhate paya ya tadera oyada kara hayechila, takhana tara sange-sange janate parabe ke sahayyalabhera ksetre durbalatara, ara sankhyara dika diye alpa.
Balo -- ''ami jani na tomadera ya oyada kara hayeche ta asanna, na amara prabhu tara jan'ya kono dirghamiyada sthira karabena.’’
Tini adrsyera parijnata, ta'i karo kache tini tamra rahasya prakasa karena na
rasulera madhye yamke tini manonayana karechena tamke byatita, sejan'ya niscaya tini tamra samane o tamra pechane prahari niyojita karena
yena tini janate parena ye tamra tamdera prabhura banisamuha paumche diyechena ki na, ara tini ghire achena tamdera kachera saba- kichu, ara tini saba-kichura hisaba rakhena gone-gone.
He bastracchadanakari
tumi uthe damra'o raterabela alpasamaya byatita
tara ardheka, athaba tara theke kichuta kamiye na'o
athaba era upare bariye na'o, ara kura'ana abrtti karo dhirasthirabhabe santa-sundara abrttite.
Nihsandeha amara tomara upare capacchi eka gurubhara bani.
Nihsandeha rata-jege upasana -- e hacche balisthatama padaksepa o susansthapita baktabya.
Nihsandeha tomara jan'ya dinera belaya rayeche sudirgha karmatatparata.
Sutaram tomara prabhura nama kirtana karo ebam tamra prati dhyanadharanaya magna ha'o ekanistha dhyane.
Purbancala o pascimancalera prabhu, tini byatita kono upasya ne'i, sutaram tamke'i karnadhararupe grahana karo.
Ara adhyabasaya caliye ya'o tara ya bale ta sattbe'o, ara tadera parihara kare calo saujan'yamaya parihare
ara chere da'o amake ebam satyapratyakhyanakaridera, bilasa-samagrira adhikaridera, ara tadera birama da'o alpakala.
Nihsandeha amadera kache ache bhari sikala o jbalanta aguna
ara khadya ya galaya atake yaya, ara marmantuda sasti
se'idina prthibi o paharagulo kempe uthabe, ara paharagulo haye yabe stupakara balira gada
nihsandeha amara tomadera kache ejana rasula pathiyechi, tomadera upare saksirupe, yemana amara phira'a'unera kache ekajana rasula pathiyechilama.
Kinta phira'a'una se'i rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale amara take pakara'o karechilama nidaruna pakaranote.
Ata'eba kemana kare tomara a‌tmaraksa karabe, yadi tomara abisbasa kara se'i dinake yedina chelepiledera cula pakiye tulabe
akasa habe bidirna? Tamra oyada abasya'i bastabayita habe.
Niscaya'i eti ekati smaranakari bisaya, sutaram ye iccha kare se tara prabhura dike patha dharuka.

Tomara prabhu abasya janena ye tumi to jege thaka ratera praya du'i-trtiyansa, ara tara ardheka ara tara eka-trtiyansa, ara tomara sange yara ache tadera ekati dala'o. Ara allah rata o dinera parimapa raksa karena. Tini janena ye tomara kakhano era hisaba rakhate parabe na, kaje'i tini tomadera dike phirechena, sejan'ya kura'ana theke yatata tomadera jan'ya sahaja tatata abrtti karo. Tini janena ye tomadera ke'u-ke'u rogagrasta habe ebam an'yera duniyate case berabe allah‌ra karunabhandarera sandhane, ara an'yan'yara allah‌ra pathe yud'dha karabe, sejan'ya e-theke yatata tomara sahaja mane kara tatata abrtti karo, ara namaya kayema rekho o yakata adaya karo ebam allah‌ke rnadana karo uttama rna. Ara ya kichu satkaja tomara nijedera jan'ya agabara'o ta tomara allah‌ra kache pabe, -- seti'i besi bhala o birata pratidana. Ara allah‌ra kache paritrana khomjo, nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
He priya posaka-parihita
otho ebam satarka karo
ara tomara prabhu -- maha‌tmya ghosana karo
ara tomara posaka -- tabe pabitra karo
ara kadaryata -- tabe parihara karo
ara anugraha karo na besi pabara pratyasaya
ara tomara prabhura jan'ya tabe adhyabasaya caliye ya'o.
Tarapara yakhana sinaya a'oyaja de'oya habe
seti tabe habe, se'i dinati, eka mahasankatera dina
abisbasidera upare; aramadayaka naya.
Chere da'o amake o take yake ami srsti karechi ekakabhabe
ara tara jan'ya ami bipula dhanasampada diyechilama
ara santanasantati pratyaksa abasthanakari
ara tara jan'ya ami sahaja kare diyechilama sbacchandabhabe
tarapare'o se caya ye ami yena aro bariye di'i
kakhano naya! Kenana se amadera nirdesabali sanbandhe ghora birud'dhacari.
Ami tara upare anaba eka kramabardhamana aghata.
Kenana niscaya se bhabanacinta karala ebam mepejokhe dekhala.
Sutaram se nipata yaka! Kemanatara se yaca'i karechila
punasca se nipata yaka! Kemana kare se yaca'i karachila
se abara takiye dekhala
tarapara se bhrakuncita karala o mukha bikrta karala
tarapara se pichiye gela o buka phuliye egiye ela
tarapara balale -- ''e barabara cale asa jadu bai to naya
e ekajana manusera katha bai to naya.’’
Ami sighra'i take phelaba jbalamaya agune.
Ara ki tomake bojhabe jbalamaya agunata ki
ta kichu'i baki rakhe na, ara kichu'i chere deya na
manusake ekebare jhalase debe
tara upare rayeche''unisa’’.

Ara amara phiris‌tadera chara agunera prahari kari ni, ara yara abisbasa posana kareche tadera pariksarupe chara amara edera sankhya nirdharana kari ni, yena yadera grantha deya hayechila tadera drrhapratyaya janme, ara yara bisbasa kareche tadera imana yena bardhita haya, ara yadera grantha de'oya hayeche o yara bisbasi tara yena sandeha na kare, ara yadera antare byadhi rayeche o yara abisbasi tara yena balate pare -- ''e'i rupakera dbara allah ki bojhate ca'ichena?’’ E'ibhabe allah bibhranta karena yake tini iccha karena, ebam pathanirdesa dena yake tini cana. Ara tini chara ara ke'u tomara prabhura bahinike samyaka jane na. Bastuta eti manabakulera jan'ya eka satarkikarana bai to naya.
Na! Bhabo camdera katha
ara ratera katha yakhana tara abasana ghate.
Ara prabhatakalera katha yakhana ta haya alokojjbala.
Nihsandeha eti ati birata eka byapara
manusera jan'ya satarkikaranarupe
tomadera madhyera tara jan'ya ye agabarate caya, athaba pechane thakate caya.
Pratyeka sattba'i jamina thakabe ya se arjana kare tara jan'ya
danadikera lokera byatita
jannate, tara parasparake jijnasabada karabe
aparadhidera samparke
Kise tomadera niye eseche jbalamaya agune?’’
Tara balabe -- ''amara namayidera antarbhukta chilama na
ara amara abhabagrastadera khabara dite ca'itama na
baram amara brtha tarka karatama brtha tarkakaridera sange
ara amara bicarera dinake mithya balatama
yataksana na abasyambhabi amadera kache esechila.’’
Phale suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kono kaje asabe na.
Tadera tabe ki hayeche ye tara anusasana theke phire cale yaya
yena tara bhita-trasta gadhara dala
paliye yacche sinhera theke
bastuta tadera madhyera pratyekati loka'i caya ye take yena de'oya haya kholamela kagajera tara.
Kakhano na. Tara kinta parakalera bhaya kare na.
Kaksano na! Eti niscaya'i eka anusasana.
Sutaram ye ke'u caya se eti smarana karuka.
Ara tara manonibesa karabe na yadi na allah iccha karena. Tini'i bhayabhakti karara yogya patra ebam tini'i paritranera yathartha adhikari.
Na, ami sapatha karachi kiyamatera dinera.
Ara na, ami sapatha karachi a‌tmasamalocanaparayana a‌tmara.
Manusa ki mane kare ye amara kakhano tara haragora ekatrita karaba na
ham, amara tara anulagulo paryanta punarbin'yasta karate saksama.
Tabu'o manusa caya ya tara samane rayeche ta asbikara karate.
Se prasna kare -- ''kakhana kiyamatera dina asabe?’’
Kinta yakhana drsti disahara haye yabe
ara candra habe andhakaracchanna
ara surya o candrake ekatrita kara habe
manusa se'idina balabe -- ''kothaya palanora sthana?’’
Kichute'i na, kono asrayasthala ne'i.
Sedina tha'i habe kebala tomara prabhura nikate'i.
Manusake se'idina janano habe ki se agabariyeche ebam se phele rekheche.
Bastuta manusa tara nijera sattba sanbandhe caksusmana
yadi'o se tara ajuhata dekhaya.
Era dbara tomara jihaba naracara karo na eke tbaranbita karate.
Nihsandeha amadera upare'i rayeche era sangrahera o era patha karanora dayitba.
Sutaram yakhana amara ta patha kari takhana tumi tara pathana anusarana karo
tarapara niscaya amadera'i upare rayeche era byakhyakarana.
Na, tomara kintu bhalabasa ksanasthayi
ara abahela kara parakalake.
Sedina katakagulo mukha habe ujjbala
tadera prabhura dike ceye thakabe
ara katakagulo mukha se'idina bibarna haye yabe
e'i bhebe ye kono bidhbansi biparyaya tadera upare parate yacche.
Na, yakhana eti galaya ese paumchube
ebam bala habe -- ''ke se'i jadukara?’’
Ara se bujhate pare ye, e hacche bidaya bela
ebam eka payera hara an'ya payera hare thokara khete thakabe
tomara prabhura dike'i se'idina habe caliye ne'oya.
Se to satyanistha chila na, ara namaya'o pare ni
baram se satyapratyakhyana karechila ebam phire esechila
tarapara se tara sbajanaganera kache giyechila garba karate karate.
Tumi nipata ya'o! Tabe nipata ya'o
abara tumi nipata ya'o, phale nipata ya'o!’’
Manusa ki bhabe ye take chere deya habe bamdhanacharabhabe
se ki chila na eka sukrakita eka sabege nirgata skhalanera madhyekara
tarapara se halo ekati raktapinda, tarapara tini akrti dana karalena o purnanga karalena.
Tarapara tini ta hate srsti karalena tara yugala -- purusa o nari.
Tabu'o ki tini ksamatabana nana mrtake punarjibita karate
manusera upare ki dirgha samayera abakasa atibahita haya ni yakhana se ullekhayogya kichu'i chila na
nihsandeha amara manusake srsti karechi sanyukta eka sukrakita theke, amara take srnkhalabad'dha karechi, sejan'ya amara ta ke baniyechi srabanasakti o drstisakti sampanna.
Nihsandeha amara take pathera nirdesa diyechi, -- haya se krtajna habe, na haya se akrtajna habe.
Amara abasya akrtajnadera jan'ya tairi karechi sikala o beri, ara jbalanta aguna.
Nihsandeha punya‌tmara pana karabe emana ekati patra theke yara mejaja habe karpurera
ekati phoyara -- ya theke allah‌ra bandara pana karabe, tara etike prabahita karabe abirama dharaya.
Tara manata palana kare, ebam bhaya kare se'i dinatira yara dhbansalila habe suduraprasari.
Ara tara tamra prati premabasatah khabara khete deya abhabagrastake o etimake o bandike
amara tomadera khete dicchi sudhu allah‌ra santastilabhera jan'ya, tomadera theke amara kono pratidana ca'i na, krtajnata'o naya.
Amara alabat amadera prabhura nikata theke eka bhitiprada bipadasankula dinera bhaya kari.’’
Kaje'i allah tadera raksa karabena se'idinera akalyana theke ebam tadera saksat karabena praphullatara o prasantira sathe
ara yehetu tara adhyabasaya caliyechila sejan'ya pratidane tadera debena bagana o resami posaka
tara sekhane samasina thakabe rajakiya asane, tara sekhane dekhate pabe na suryottapa, na kono kanakane thanda
ara tadera sannikate thakabe tadera gachera chaya, ara tadera thoka-thoka phala thakabe nata haye nagalera madhye.
Ara tadera samane paribesana kara habe rupora peyala o jhalamale kacera panapatra
camdira tairi cak‌make kacera mato, -- tara ta mepe nebe ekati parimape.
Ara tadera tate pana karano habe emana ekati patra yara mejaja habe adrakera
tara madhyera ekati phoyarate yara nama deya hayeche sal‌sabila.
Ara tadera pradaksina karabe cirasphutita kisoragana, -- tomara yakhana tadera dekhabe tadera tomara bhababe charano mukto
ara yakhana tumi sekhane ceye dekhabe, tumi dekhate pabe anugraha-samagri o eka bisala rajya.
Tadera paridheya habe mihi sabuja resamera o puru jarira posaka, ara tadera alankrta karano habe rupora kamkana diye, ara tadera prabhu tadera pana karabena eka pabitra paniya.
Nihsandeha eti hacche tomadera jan'ya puraskara, ara tomadera pracesta sbikrta hayeche.’’
Nihsandeha amara -- amara sbayam tomara kache e'i kuraaana eka abatarane abatirna karechi.
Sutaram tomara prabhura nirdesera jan'ya adhyabasaya caliye ya'o, ara tadera madhyekara kono papisthera athaba satyapratyakhyana- karira ajna palana karo na.
Ara tomara prabhura nama kirtana karo sakale o bikele
ara ratera theke tamra prati sijada karo, ara lanba rata paryanta tamra gunagana karo.
Nihsandeha era bhalabase asthayi jibana, ara abahela kare edera samanera eka kathina dinake.
Amara'i tadera srsti karechi ebam majabuta karechi tadera gathana, kaje'i yakhana amara ca'iba takhana tadera anurupadera amara badale debo amula paribartane.
Nihsandeha eti eka smaraniya barta, sutaram ye iccha kare se tara prabhura dike patha dharuka.
Ara tomara ca'o na allah‌ra ca'oya byatireke. Nihsandeha allah hacchena sarbajnata, paramajnani.
Tini yake iccha karena take tamra anugrahera madhye prabesa karana. Kinta an'yayakarira -- tadera jan'ya tini tairi karechena marmantuda sasti.
Bhabo preritapurusaganera katha -- ekera para eka
ara bhabo jharera mato asa damaka ha'oyara katha
ara bhabo yara characche charanora mato
tarapara alada kare deya alada karane
tarapara gethe demya smaraka grantha
parisodhita karate athaba satarka karate.
Niscaya tomadera ya oyada kara hayeche ta abasya'i ghatate yacche.
Sutaram yakhana taragulo jhimiye parabe.
Ara yakhana akasa bhenge parabe
ara yakhana paharaguloke uriye de'oya habe
ara yakhana rasulaganake nirdharita samaye niye asa habe
kona se dinera jan'ya dharya rakha hayeche
phayasalara dinera jan'ya.
Ara ki tomake bujhate debe phayasalara dinati ki
dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera jan'ya
Amara ki purbabartidera nidhana kari ni
tarapara parabartidera'o amara tadera anugamana karaba.
E'ibhabe'i amara aparadhidera prati acarana kare thaki.
Dhika se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
tomadera ki amara srsti kari ni eka tuccha jaliya padartha theke
tarapara amara ta sthapana kari eka suraksita sthane
eka abahita parimapa paryanta
tarapara amara bin'yasta kari, sutaram kata nipuna bin'yasakari amara
dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
amara ki prthibitake bana'i ni adhararupe
jibita o mrta
ara tate'i to amara baniyechi umcu pahara-parbata, ara tomadera pana karate diyechi supeya pani
dhika se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
tomara calo tara'i dike yake tomara asbikara karate
calo se'i chayara dike yara rayeche tinati stara
ya chayamaya naya ebam agnisikha theke raksa karara mato'o naya.
Nihsandeha eti sphulinga tole attalikara akare
yena segulo haludabarana utera pala.’’
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
e hacche ai dina yedina tara kono katha balate parabe na
ara tadera anumati de'oya habe na yena tara ajuhata dekhate pare.
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhanakaridera prati
e'i hacche phayasala karara dina, amara tomadera samabeta karechi, ara purbabartidera'o.
Sutaram tomadera yadi kono kalakausala thake tahale amara birud'dhe apakausala cala'o.
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
niscaya dharmabhirura thakabe snigdhachayaya o phoyaragulote
ara phalaphasalera madhye ya tara pete caya.
Kha'o ara piyo mahanande ya tomara kare calechile sejan'ya.’’
Nihsandeha e'ibhabe'i amara pratidana di'i satkarmasiladera.
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
kha'o-da'o ara bhoga kare na'o alpakalera jan'ya -- tomara to aparadhi!’’

Ara yakhana tadera bala haya''nata ha'o’’, tara nata haya na.
Dhik se'idina satyapratyakhyanakaridera prati
ata'eba era pare ara kona banite tara bisbasa karabe
